translation.en: [crowd chanting] Santi! Santi!
translation.zh: 桑蒂！

translation.en: Santi! Santi! Santi!
translation.zh: 桑蒂！

translation.en: [announcer] Yo, Miami!
translation.zh: 迈阿密的各位好！

translation.en: On the first leg of his world tour,
translation.zh: 这是他世界巡演的第一站

translation.en: make some noise, y'all!
translation.zh: 大家来点掌声啊！

translation.en: It's Santi!
translation.zh: 有请桑蒂！

translation.en: ♪ Tú dices que eres lowkey Pero ese booty ♪ ♪ Exagerao ♪
translation.zh: （桑蒂）

translation.en: Absolutely, so heavy.
translation.zh: 绝对精彩

translation.en: -Honestly, the heaviest. -I couldn't have done it
translation.zh: -真的 是最精彩的-要不是有朋友支持

translation.en: -without my corillo! -[phone vibrates]
translation.zh: 我是没法做到的！

translation.en: -Yo, Daddy Yankee! Dímelo, hermano. -[Daddy Yankee] Santi.
translation.zh: -嘿 洋基老爹！你说 老兄-桑蒂

translation.en: -You're a star. -[girls tittering]
translation.zh: 老弟 你真是个明星

translation.en: -Hey, I gotta call you right back. -Dale, papi.
translation.zh: 嘿 我回头再打给你

translation.en: Santi, we love you so much.
translation.zh: 桑蒂 我们很喜欢你

translation.en: Let's all have sex,
translation.zh: 我们做爱吧

translation.en: together.
translation.zh: 四个一起

translation.en: Santi, you can't. It's time.
translation.zh: 桑蒂 不行 到时间了

translation.en: Time for what?
translation.zh: 到什么时间了？

translation.en: You ladies can head back with me.
translation.zh: 你们三位可以跟我回家

translation.en: -It's time. Come on. -Ness!
translation.zh: -到时间了 快-内丝！

translation.en: What? We can share!
translation.zh: 什么？我们可以分享！

translation.en: -We gotta go. We gotta go. Come on. -No.
translation.zh: -我们得走了 快-不要

translation.en: Come on, Santi, wake up.
translation.zh: 拜托 桑蒂 快醒醒

translation.en: -Wake up. -[groaning]
translation.zh: 醒醒

translation.en: -Wake up. It's time. -Bro, wake up.
translation.zh: -醒醒 到时间了-哥们 快醒醒

translation.en: -You don't wanna miss this. -Oh, I had the craziest dream.
translation.zh: -你可不想错过这个-我做了一个很疯狂的梦

translation.en: Tell me everything before we forget.
translation.zh: 趁没忘记前 全都告诉我

translation.en: -Why do you guys do this? -[Felix] Ness,
translation.zh: -你们干吗要这么做？-内丝

translation.en: I'm this young man's creative director,
translation.zh: 我是这位年轻人的创意总监

translation.en: and dreams are a creative director's clay, if you will.
translation.zh: 而梦就是创意总监的素材如果你想这么说的话

translation.en: -Do you will? -What?
translation.zh: -你想吗？-什么？

translation.en: -Do you will? -Okay, Felix,
translation.zh: -你想吗？-好吧 菲利克斯

translation.en: as this young man's manager, shut the fuck up
translation.zh: 作为这位年轻人的经纪人我要求你闭上嘴

translation.en: and find a gas station like I've asked you to do.
translation.zh: 找个加油站 我早就让你找了

translation.en: -Yes, sorry. -Guys, we're so blessed.
translation.zh: -好的 抱歉-伙计们 我们太幸运了

translation.en: I mean, we're moving to Miami. Like, this is it.
translation.zh: 我们要搬去迈阿密了这就是迈向成功之路

translation.en: Oh, my God, not this again.
translation.zh: 我的天 又来了

translation.en: I gotta get you there in under an hour,
translation.zh: 我得在一小时之内把你送到那里

translation.en: to give us enough time to move into the apartment, to eat,
translation.zh: 这样才能有足够的时间入住公寓、吃饭

translation.en: and get at least eight hours of beauty sleep
translation.zh: 并在跟唱片公司会面前睡个至少八小时的

translation.en: before the label meeting--
translation.zh: 美容觉…

translation.en: -Shit! -[man] …with his viral hit,
translation.zh: -老天！-…来自迈尔斯堡的

translation.en: -with over six million views and counting… -[screams]
translation.zh: 本地艺人桑蒂的走红作品《高大上》

translation.en: -…"Exagerao," by Fort Myers' own, Santi. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 点击率超过六百万次 而且还在增加

translation.en: -Let's go! -Hey, bro, you're on the radio!
translation.zh: -太棒了！-嘿 哥们 你的歌上广播电台了！

translation.en: -["Exagerao" playing] -I'm starstruck.
translation.zh: 我是你的歌迷

translation.en: Guys, this is it. This is destiny!
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们要成功了这就是天意！

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -太好了！-耶！

translation.en: [Ness] Yes!
translation.zh: 真棒！

translation.en: ♪ Frikitona, me lo puso de espaldas ♪
translation.zh: （迈阿密 123公里）

translation.en: ♪ No es el sol, pero quiero que salga Bandida ♪
translation.zh: （欢迎来到迈阿密海滩）

translation.en: ♪ Tú de mí no te olvidas ♪
translation.zh: 《霓虹声梦》

translation.en: It feels so good to finally not be a tourist in Miami.
translation.zh: 终于不再以游客的身份出现在迈阿密 感觉真好

translation.en: -[Ness laughs] -Miami.
translation.zh: 迈阿密

translation.en: Oh, this is gonna be great.
translation.zh: 这将会很棒的

translation.en: -This is gonna be so great! -I--
translation.zh: 将会非常棒！

translation.en: Yo, we've been here five minutes, already seen your cousin Sebastian's ads.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们来了才五分钟就已经看到你堂哥的广告了 （做提臀被坑？打给赛巴斯蒂安为你的臀部讨回公道）

translation.en: He must be killing it with all the fucked-up BBLs here.
translation.zh: 这里有很多提臀手术失败的妞他肯定赚发了

translation.en: A botched BBL wouldn't be a dealbreaker for me.
translation.zh: 我不会在乎提臀效果拙劣

translation.en: It's like getting a discount on bruised fruit.
translation.zh: 这就像是买碰伤打折的水果

translation.en: Still tastes the same.
translation.zh: 味道依然是一样的

translation.en: [in Spanish] Should we take him out of the group?
translation.zh: 我们该把他赶出团队吗？

translation.en: But he's the best at what he does.
translation.zh: 我懂你的意思 但创意方面他最擅长

translation.en: I know, I hate it.
translation.zh: 我知道 我痛恨这一点

translation.en: [in English] Don't be bullies, cabrones.
translation.zh: 别欺负我 混蛋们

translation.en: -We're not bullying you. -I can tell by your tone.
translation.zh: -我们没在欺负你-我能从你们的语气里听出来

translation.en: Yo, did… Did Mia's assistant confirm for tomorrow?
translation.zh: 对了 米娅的助理确认明天的事了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. We're good. 11:30.
translation.zh: 确认了 没问题 11点半

translation.en: Yes! And she knows that all three of us are coming?
translation.zh: 太好了！她知道我们三个都会去吗？

translation.en: Just 'cause I don't have any experience,
translation.zh: 虽然我没有经验

translation.en: doesn't mean I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 但并不表示我不懂行

translation.en: That's what that means. -[phone beeps] -[Santi] What?
translation.zh: -没经验就是不懂行的意思-什么？

translation.en: "Thinking of the kids suffering in Africa and countries around the world."
translation.zh: “心怀非洲和世界其他国家受苦受难的孩子们

translation.en: "I do this for y'all."
translation.zh: 我唱歌是为了你们”

translation.en: You have alerts on for Javier Luna's Instagram?
translation.zh: 你会收到哈维尔·卢纳在社媒平台上的发帖提醒？

translation.en: You being jealous of Javier Luna, one of my favorites.
translation.zh: 我最爱看你嫉妒哈维尔·卢纳的样子了

translation.en: Also, his origin story is very fascinating.
translation.zh: 还有 他出道的故事非常精彩

translation.en: I'm not jealous of Javier. I'm just asking why does he have his alerts on?
translation.zh: 我不是嫉妒哈维尔只是想知道他为什么要开着提醒

translation.en: I don't get why people compare us.
translation.zh: 大家为什么要拿我们俩作比较？

translation.en: That guy is like a reggaeton Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.zh: 这家伙就像是雷鬼乐的机关枪凯利

translation.en: He doesn't even write his own music.
translation.zh: 他的歌甚至都不是自己写的

translation.en: What's wrong with MGK?
translation.zh: 机关枪凯利哪里不好了？

translation.en: You at least have alerts on for my page, right?
translation.zh: 你至少也开着我的发帖提醒吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: How are you in charge of my social media page
translation.zh: 如果你只开哈维尔·卢纳的发帖提醒

translation.en: but you only have alerts on for Javier Luna and not me?
translation.zh: 你要怎么负责我的社媒页面啊？

translation.en: Why do I need to have alerts on? I post things. I'm the alert.
translation.zh: 我要你的社媒页面提醒干吗？帖子是我发的 不用提醒

translation.en: This is why I should be in charge of socials.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么该由我来负责社媒宣传

translation.en: -You in charge of socials? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你负责社媒宣传？-对

translation.en: -Ness, you have two friends. -Yeah, so do you.
translation.zh: -内丝 你只有两个好友-对 你也是啊

translation.en: Who do you want running your Instagram?
translation.zh: 你希望谁来管理你的社媒宣传？

translation.en: Yo, Africa's not even a country.
translation.zh: 嘿 非洲都不是一个国家

translation.en: It isn't, right?
translation.zh: 不是的 对吧？

translation.en: -[Irma] There it is. This is it. -Ness.
translation.zh: -就在这里 就是这地方-内丝

translation.en: [chuckling] This is not what was in the photos.
translation.zh: 内丝 这地方跟照片里的不一样

translation.en: Relax, I got this.
translation.zh: 别紧张 我会解决

translation.en: This is not what was in the photos.
translation.zh: 这地方跟照片里的不一样

translation.en: I know, but the pictures are old, very old.
translation.zh: 我知道 但那些是旧照片 很旧

translation.en: I had it updated since.
translation.zh: 拍完之后 我把这里更新了一下

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Did anybody die in here?
translation.zh: 这地方死过人吗？

translation.en: I'm definitely feeling someone's ancestors.
translation.zh: 我绝对能感觉到一股阴气

translation.en: It's not what we thought.
translation.zh: 这里跟我们想的不一样

translation.en: But this place is fine. It comes furnished, I mean…
translation.zh: 但这地方还行 带着家具…

translation.en: It works.
translation.zh: 能凑合

translation.en: Given this was a bait and switch,
translation.zh: 鉴于照片不实 属于诱售

translation.en: obviously, we're gonna need some sort of discount.
translation.zh: 你得在租金上给我们打点折扣

translation.en: There's gonna be an extra charge for the furniture.
translation.zh: 这些家具需要额外收费

translation.en: That's the opposite of what I said.
translation.zh: 这跟我刚才的要求恰恰相反

translation.en: Keep negotiating. You're doing great.
translation.zh: 继续议价 你做得很好

translation.en: Extra. It has to be extra,
translation.zh: 额外收费 我得额外收费

translation.en: 'cause I have to cover the furniture rental, the lease.
translation.zh: 因为我得支付家具的租金 租赁费

translation.en: I have to pay for the beds, the couch, the table, the spoons.
translation.zh: 我得付床、沙发、桌子、餐勺的钱

translation.en: -Spoons? -[Santi] Look.
translation.zh: -餐勺？-听着

translation.en: Even with the extra, guys, I mean, this is fine. We're…
translation.zh: 就算要加收费用这里也还行 我们…

translation.en: We're in. It's a great deal.
translation.zh: 我们要了 这笔买卖不错

translation.en: Let's make it happen.
translation.zh: 我们成交吧

translation.en: -It's a deal. -Perfect.
translation.zh: -成交-太好了

translation.en: Eh, mmm, we'll take care of the paperwork.
translation.zh: 我们会把相关文件弄好

translation.en: It's gonna be two days to process and then you are in.
translation.zh: 大概需要两天时间然后你们就能住进来了

translation.en: I thought that we were moving in today.
translation.zh: 不是说今天就能搬进来吗？

translation.en: No, no, I didn't say today. I say two-day.
translation.zh: 不 不是“今天” 是“两天”

translation.en: -No, but we need to be in today. -No.
translation.zh: -可我们今天就需要住进来-不行

translation.en: Can we please find another place?
translation.zh: 能不能找到其他地方？

translation.en: Not that wouldn't blow our budget.
translation.zh: 在你的预算之内没有他选

translation.en: Okay, is there any way
translation.zh: 好吧 有没有什么办法

translation.en: that we can move in, maybe later this afternoon or maybe tonight?
translation.zh: 能让我们今天住进来？下午晚些时候 或者晚上也行

translation.en: Because we don't have anywhere else to go.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有别的地方可去

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: I feel like you didn't even think about that. You just said "no," real quick.
translation.zh: 我觉得你都没考虑就直接说了“不行”

translation.en: -No. -That was the same speed.
translation.zh: -不行-这还是没考虑呀

translation.en: No. Two days.
translation.zh: 不行 两天

translation.en: Come on, mami?
translation.zh: 求你了 美女

translation.en: -Two days. -Two days.
translation.zh: -两天-没错

translation.en: Guys, it's really not that big of a deal.
translation.zh: 伙计们 这真的没啥大不了

translation.en: We can get a motel until the place is ready.
translation.zh: 我们可以在搬进来之前先找个汽车旅馆

translation.en: I mean, that's one option, but also it's kind of not.
translation.zh: 这是个办法 但也不是

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: We're already spending way more than I thought on furniture,
translation.zh: 我们在家具上的花费已经远远超出预计

translation.en: and other than the money I set aside for studio time,
translation.zh: 除了为租录音棚准备的钱

translation.en: we don't have extra.
translation.zh: 我们没钱可用了

translation.en: We start spending, we start losing.
translation.zh: 现在花多少钱 回头就会缺多少钱

translation.en: A motel means we lose, I don't know, a bed.
translation.zh: 住汽车旅馆就意味着…没钱付床的租金

translation.en: Or spoons.
translation.zh: 或是餐勺

translation.en: What about Sebastian? I bet his place is sick,
translation.zh: 要不去找赛巴斯蒂安吧？他的住处一定很大

translation.en: he's got that botched Brazilian booty bread.
translation.zh: 他有打臀部官司赚的钱

translation.en: Dude, there's no way that I'm calling Sebby.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我决不会给赛巴打电话的

translation.en: That's admitting defeat before we even start.
translation.zh: 打了就等于还没开始就承认失败

translation.en: He wants to help. He even offered you a job.
translation.zh: 他想帮你 他甚至都提出过给你活干

translation.en: If I call him, he's gonna call my dad, and start talking shit,
translation.zh: 如果给他打电话 他就会打给我爸然后开始瞎说一气

translation.en: then my dad will call my tías and tíos
translation.zh: 然后我爸就会给我叔叔婶婶打电话

translation.en: and say that I should've fucking taken an office job just like them.
translation.zh: 说我该像他们一样找一份办公室的工作

translation.en: I don't want Sebby to know that I'm here.
translation.zh: 我都不想让赛巴知道我在这里

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do? I vote that we go back home.
translation.zh: 那我们要怎么办？我提议打道回府

translation.en: No. [sighs]
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: If we start driving back,
translation.zh: 如果现在开始往回开

translation.en: we can make it back in a couple of hours, beat traffic.
translation.zh: 就能避开堵车 在几个小时内赶回去

translation.en: [Santi] Big meeting tomorrow. Get some sleep.
translation.zh: 伙计们 明天有重要会面 睡吧

translation.en: Everybody good?
translation.zh: 大家都舒服吗？

translation.en: [Ness] Yes, perfect. I love this.
translation.zh: 舒服极了 我喜欢这样

translation.en: Ness, you're tall. Wouldn't you rather be somewhere spacious,
translation.zh: 内丝 你个子很高不想找个宽敞点的地方吗？

translation.en: like the trunk, or the undercarriage?
translation.zh: 比如说后备箱 或者车的底盘？

translation.en: Ow, what the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Santi, were you trying to fuck the landlady earlier?
translation.zh: 桑蒂 你刚才是不是想跟房东上床？

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -[Felix] Come on, park. -[Ness] We gotta move, we're running late.
translation.zh: -拜托 快点 停下就是-得抓紧 我们晚了

translation.en: [Felix] All right, hurry up.
translation.zh: 好了 抓紧 快点

translation.en: Do you really need your fucking backpack?
translation.zh: 你真有必要带着背包吗？

translation.en: Guys, we only have ten minutes.
translation.zh: 我们只有十分钟时间

translation.en: Ness, I can help you with your makeup.
translation.zh: 内丝 我可以帮你化妆

translation.en: We're all looking a little tired from last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚没睡好 大家都有点憔悴

translation.en: I did my makeup already.
translation.zh: 我早就化好妆了

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sure it's fine then. -I could kill you.
translation.zh: -那应该就行了-当心我杀了你

translation.en: So, look, when Mia asks us to sign this record deal,
translation.zh: 听着 米娅要我们签署唱片合约时

translation.en: do I say yes right away?
translation.zh: 我该马上答应吗？

translation.en: Or do I pretend like I'm thinking about it, and then be like,
translation.zh: 还是假装要考虑一下 然后说

translation.en: -"Yeah, we'll sign." -[Ness] Okay, no.
translation.zh: -“好吧 我们签”-好吧 不是这样的

translation.en: She's not offering us a record deal.
translation.zh: 她不会提出跟我们签唱片合约的

translation.en: She might not even help us.
translation.zh: 她甚至可能都不会帮我们

translation.en: We have to prepare for everything.
translation.zh: 我们得做好最坏的打算

translation.en: The only thing I'm preparing for
translation.zh: 我唯一在准备的事

translation.en: is filling our oceanfront balcony with hoes.
translation.zh: 就是让我们的海滨阳台挤满“鸡”

translation.en: Sorry, shouldn't have said that.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不该说这话的

translation.en: I'm trying new things. It's Miami.
translation.zh: 我在尝试新事物 这里是迈阿密

translation.en: Don't expect her to offer us anything.
translation.zh: 别期望她会给我们任何提议

translation.en: If she did, that would be great. But we have a plan.
translation.zh: 如果她提了 那最好但我们有自己的计划

translation.en: So remember the plan. We have this meeting,
translation.zh: 记住我们的计划 我们去跟米娅会面

translation.en: we parlay that into other meetings,
translation.zh: 借此创造更多会面机会

translation.en: then we network with DJ and industry types,
translation.zh: 然后跟DJ和业内人士建立联系

translation.en: spend a little money to promote on some playlists
translation.zh: 一旦我们弄清楚谁是关键人物

translation.en: once we figure out who's who,
translation.zh: 就花点钱推广一些歌

translation.en: build the hype, you record new music,
translation.zh: 造点声势 你录制新歌

translation.en: and then we start a bidding war between the record labels.
translation.zh: 然后挑起唱片公司之间的“桑蒂争夺战”

translation.en: Trust the plan.
translation.zh: 要相信这个计划

translation.en: So, trust the plan that has us
translation.zh: 你是要我们相信这个

translation.en: preparing for the meeting of our lives in a gas station bathroom?
translation.zh: 让我们在加油站厕所里准备人生最重要会面的计划？

translation.en: That is what I am here for. Music, plans.
translation.zh: 这是我的任务他制作音乐 我制作计划

translation.en: It's not coming to mind
translation.zh: 但我记不得

translation.en: -what you're here for. -I'm the creative director.
translation.zh: -你是干吗的了-我是创意总监

translation.en: -The fuck? -[Ness] I don't really--
translation.zh: -搞什么？-我不太…

translation.en: Stop it. We trust the plan, okay?
translation.zh: 别吵了 我们相信这个计划 好吗？

translation.en: -That's why you're the captain. -Ya tú sabe.
translation.zh: 这就是你是领队的原因

translation.en: [in English] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Is this sensor or is it a switch?
translation.zh: 这是感应灯还是用开关的？

translation.en: -Wait, wee bit higher. Up there. -No, hit it!
translation.zh: -等一下 再高一点 在那上面-不 按一下！

translation.en: Don't hit it! Don't hit it!
translation.zh: 别按！

translation.en: Santi?
translation.zh: 桑蒂？

translation.en: Ah, it's so good to finally meet you.
translation.zh: 终于见到你真是太好了

translation.en: -It's a pleasure. -[Mia laughs]
translation.zh: 是我的荣幸

translation.en: -And you must be Ness. -Yes.
translation.zh: -你准是内丝-是的

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -You, too.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你-我也是

translation.en: You must be Felix. I love how you directed the video.
translation.zh: 你准是菲利克斯我喜欢你导演那个视频的手法

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to finally connect. -Okay.
translation.zh: -很高兴我们终于见面了-好

translation.en: We can't believe that we're meeting with someone from the biggest
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我们在跟业内最大的雷鬼唱片公司的人

translation.en: -reggaeton label in the game. -Please.
translation.zh: -会面-别这么说

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Come on, let's go find our table. -[Santi] Okay.
translation.zh: -来吧 我们入座吧-好

translation.en: [softly] Calm down.
translation.zh: 冷静点

translation.en: Okay, man, look, I just gotta say,
translation.zh: 好 听着 我只想说

translation.en: I am impressed with how you do it all.
translation.zh: 你的做法给我留下了深刻的印象

translation.en: I mean, you… You write, you produce, you perform.
translation.zh: 自创、自作、自唱

translation.en: You know how rare that is in this space?
translation.zh: 知道这在业内有多罕见吗？

translation.en: You have a real ear for it.
translation.zh: 你对音乐很有鉴赏力

translation.en: Oh, and the video?
translation.zh: 还有那段视频

translation.en: Loved how y'all did the video.
translation.zh: 我超喜欢它的制作

translation.en: -It was just-- -Thank you.
translation.zh: -真的是…-谢谢夸奖

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Six million views is no joke.
translation.zh: 六百万的浏览量可不简单

translation.en: I just love when people just go out there
translation.zh: 我很喜欢看到新人敢于尝试

translation.en: and figure shit out.
translation.zh: 找到途径

translation.en: That's what you're supposed to do.
translation.zh: 就应该这样

translation.en: So, now, I have to ask, where do you see yourself going from here?
translation.zh: 现在 我要问你一句你觉得自己接下来会怎样？

translation.en: I mean, well, this might sound kind of crazy to you, but I feel like
translation.zh: 这话听上去或许有点疯狂 但我觉得

translation.en: I can be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.zh: 我能成为世界上最大的雷鬼乐明星

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound crazy at all.
translation.zh: 这话一点也不疯狂

translation.en: If you could call my parents and tell them,
translation.zh: 你要能给我父母打电话告诉他们

translation.en: that would be great.
translation.zh: 就太好了

translation.en: Yeah, I'll do it after I call mine.
translation.zh: 等我打给我父母之后 我会的

translation.en: I'll do it right after I call mine.
translation.zh: 等我打给我父母之后 我会的

translation.en: You wanna be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.zh: 你想成为世界上最大的雷鬼乐明星

translation.en: What's the next move?
translation.zh: 下一步要怎么做？

translation.en: Please tell me it's not that you moved here,
translation.zh: 千万别告诉我说 你想着搬来这里

translation.en: take a few meetings with some labels
translation.zh: 跟几家唱片公司面谈之后

translation.en: and were hoping they'd climb over each other to… [laughing] …sign you.
translation.zh: 他们就会争相要跟你签约

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh: -没有-不是

translation.en: Okay, good.
translation.zh: 好 很好

translation.en: Of course not, no, um…
translation.zh: 当然不是

translation.en: We have a really well-thought-out plan, and it's, uh, like, multifaceted.
translation.zh: 我们有一个经过深思熟虑面面俱到的方案

translation.en: I could explain it to you. It's just like--
translation.zh: 我可以解释给你听 就是…

translation.en: -Eh, I got you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我明白-哦

translation.en: It sounds intricate. I love that,
translation.zh: 听上去很复杂 我喜欢

translation.en: because not everybody has it figured out.
translation.zh: 因为不是每个人都明白这一点的

translation.en: See that guy there?
translation.zh: 看到那个家伙了吗？

translation.en: The waiter?
translation.zh: 那个服务员？

translation.en: He's a musician, too.
translation.zh: 他也是搞音乐的

translation.en: He's really good.
translation.zh: 而且很不错

translation.en: We had a meeting here a couple months ago at this exact same table.
translation.zh: 几个月前我们就在这张桌子上面谈过

translation.en: But it didn't work out the way he wanted it to.
translation.zh: 但事情没按他的设想发展

translation.en: So now, he's here bringing people sandwiches.
translation.zh: 所以现在 他在这里给人端茶送饭

translation.en: So you specifically picked this restaurant
translation.zh: 这么说 你特地挑这家饭店

translation.en: just to, like, point out that guy's failures?
translation.zh: 就为了让我们知道这家伙的失败？

translation.en: No. What I'm trying to tell you is, that's every restaurant here.
translation.zh: 不 我要告诉你们的是这里的每家饭店都有这种案例

translation.en: That's the point.
translation.zh: 这就是关键

translation.en: I can't say this without sounding just a little bit slimy,
translation.zh: 下面的话可能听上去会有点不太客气

translation.en: but the music industry is tough.
translation.zh: 但音乐界可不好混

translation.en: There's so many things new artists don't even know they don't even know.
translation.zh: 有很多事 新的艺人根本都不知道自己不知道

translation.en: Market reports,
translation.zh: 比如市场报告

translation.en: securing guest features and producers,
translation.zh: 如何敲定特邀嘉宾和制作公司

translation.en: media promotions, tour scheduling. It's…
translation.zh: 媒体促销 巡演安排 真的…

translation.en: I say that to say we have people to do all that shit for you.
translation.zh: 我这么说是想告诉你我们有专人为你做这些事

translation.en: All you worry about is make some good music.
translation.zh: 你只需创作好的歌曲就行

translation.en: Great, that's what I do.
translation.zh: 太好了 我就是干这个的

translation.en: Plus, there's upfront money, too.
translation.zh: 而且还会有预付款

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Yeah, there are a lot of uncertainties with being an independent artist.
translation.zh: 没错 当一名独立艺人有很多不确定性

translation.en: But with being an independent artist, what you do know, uh,
translation.zh: 但作为一名独立艺人的好处是

translation.en: is nothing happens without your say-so.
translation.zh: 所有的事情都是你说了才算

translation.en: [chuckles] And I mean, yeah, that is a hell of a lot more work,
translation.zh: 没错 你需要应付的事会更多

translation.en: but I don't see that as a bad thing.
translation.zh: 但我觉得这并不是坏事

translation.en: Why would working harder be a bad thing, you know?
translation.zh: 更加努力怎么会是坏事呢 对吧？

translation.en: Also, that is nothing to say of how whatever money you make
translation.zh: 更不必说你赚来的钱

translation.en: goes directly to you.
translation.zh: 都会直接归你所有

translation.en: Can't argue with that.
translation.zh: 这点我无法反驳

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 糟糕

translation.en: I'm so sorry,
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Um, I actually have to go.
translation.zh: 但我得走了

translation.en: -Wait. [laughs] -[Mia] Shit.
translation.zh: -等一下-见鬼

translation.en: You're leaving? Right now?
translation.zh: 你要走了？现在吗？

translation.en: [Mia] Yeah, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 是的 真对不起

translation.en: My, uh, label is throwing this huge beach club event tonight
translation.zh: 今晚我们唱片公司要举办一场大型海滩俱乐部活动

translation.en: and I have to call all the artists.
translation.zh: 我得给所有相关的艺人打电话

translation.en: Sounds fun.
translation.zh: 听上去很有趣

translation.en: Yes, it will be. Thank you guys so much for lunch. This was great.
translation.zh: 的确会 谢谢三位请吃午餐 很不错

translation.en: Yes, hi. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 是的 嗨

translation.en: You cannot bring him.
translation.zh: 你不能带他去

translation.en: She didn't offer us a deal. Didn't invite us to the party.
translation.zh: 她没提出要跟我们签约也没请我们去参加派对

translation.en: Didn't even offer to pay for lunch.
translation.zh: 甚至都没提出午饭由她来请

translation.en: Don't do that.
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: All I'm saying is it feels a lot like
translation.zh: 我想说的是 我觉得

translation.en: Mia showed up feeling one way about us
translation.zh: 刚见到我们时 米娅是一种态度

translation.en: and then you started spraying your Ness mist everywhere,
translation.zh: 等你开始喷洒不着边际的“内丝迷雾”之后

translation.en: then she left feeling a different way.
translation.zh: 她离开时就成了另一种态度

translation.en: Who tells someone about a party, but doesn't invite them to it?
translation.zh: 什么样的人会告诉别人有派对却不邀请对方去？

translation.en: Someone trying to send us a message.
translation.zh: 因为她想向我们传递一个信息

translation.en: Someone covered
translation.zh: 因为她被“内丝迷雾”

translation.en: -in Ness mist. -Stop saying that.
translation.zh: -喷了一身-别再说这个词了

translation.en: -It's gross. -For real,
translation.zh: -很恶心-说真的

translation.en: what was going on back there? You started to go off script.
translation.zh: 刚才是怎么回事？你突然不按计划行事了

translation.en: I'm the manager, right?
translation.zh: 我是你的经纪人 对吗？

translation.en: I have to make sure that we make smart decisions.
translation.zh: 我得确保我们会做明智的决定

translation.en: It didn't all the way feel like that.
translation.zh: 但给我的感觉不是这样

translation.en: It felt like there was some subtext that Mia for sure noticed.
translation.zh: 感觉你的话里有潜台词而且米娅肯定注意到了

translation.en: So you thought we had a good plan before, but now you don't?
translation.zh: 你之前觉得我们的计划很不错现在不这样想了？

translation.en: Diablo, it took one lunch meeting for you to trust somebody more than us.
translation.zh: 见鬼 才吃了一顿午饭你就开始相信别人 不相信我们了

translation.en: I did not mean it like that. I'm just saying that
translation.zh: 我不是这个意思 我只是在说

translation.en: Mia, she started to say that our whole plan out here is shitty.
translation.zh: 米娅一上来就提出我们原先的计划很糟糕

translation.en: -That didn't set off bells in your head? -That's literally
translation.zh: -这一点不让你担心吗？-他们就是干这个的

translation.en: what they do, it's a power game. She wants us to think we need her.
translation.zh: 这是一场权力的博弈她想让我们觉得我们需要她

translation.en: If I wasn't in this group, I would think it's hilarious
translation.zh: 我要不是这个团队的一分子就会觉得

translation.en: how fucked we are. It took us one lunch meeting
translation.zh: 我们真的很可笑 只吃了一顿午餐

translation.en: for Ness to lose us our multimillion dollar record deal.
translation.zh: 内丝就害我们丢掉了价值数百万美元的唱片合约

translation.en: There was no deal!
translation.zh: 根本就没什么合约！

translation.en: There was a deal. And you fucked it!
translation.zh: 有的 但被你搞砸了！

translation.en: You know what? Fuck it.
translation.zh: 你们猜怎么着？不管了

translation.en: We gotta go to this party.
translation.zh: 我们要去参加那个派对

translation.en: -The one Mia didn't invite us to? -[Ness] Yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？米娅没邀请我们去的那个？-对

translation.en: We show her we're not some fucking loser wannabes.
translation.zh: 得让她知道我们不是那种有想法没实力的窝囊废

translation.en: Ness, the three of us currently live in a 2009 Toyota Corolla.
translation.zh: 内丝 我们三个现在住在一辆2009款的丰田卡罗拉里

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. I'm gonna find that party and go there,
translation.zh: 我要找到派对地点 我们要去那里

translation.en: and I'm going to get "Exagerao" played there.
translation.zh: 然后我会让他们播放《高大上》

translation.en: It won't be listed online.
translation.zh: 你在网上查不到的

translation.en: It's an industry event, not a college job fair.
translation.zh: 那是业内活动 不是大学招聘会

translation.en: -Found it. -Oh.
translation.zh: 找到了

translation.en: How did you find that?
translation.zh: 你怎么找到的？

translation.en: Went to the label's site, found an employee registry,
translation.zh: 先上那家唱片公司的网站找到他们的团队信息

translation.en: went to Instagram, looked for pictures, names.
translation.zh: 接着上社媒平台寻找相符的照片和人名

translation.en: Then I checked if anyone had posted it,
translation.zh: 然后再看看有没有谁发过派对信息

translation.en: 'cause everybody posts everything.
translation.zh: 当然会有 因为大家什么事都会发贴

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Doesn't make sense.
translation.zh: 这样做说不通

translation.en: It'll feel weird to show up there uninvited, like--
translation.zh: 不请自去会感觉很奇怪 就像…

translation.en: No, it's a straight-up bad idea.
translation.zh: 不行 这绝对是个馊主意

translation.en: At best, Mia is on the fence about a deal.
translation.zh: 目前最好的情况是米娅对签约的事犹豫不决

translation.en: If we show up to a party we're not even supposed to know about,
translation.zh: 如果我们出现在一个我们根本不该知道的派对上

translation.en: she'll think we're stalking her.
translation.zh: 她会觉得我们在非法跟踪她

translation.en: -It'll ruin our chance. -No. We should go.
translation.zh: -会毁掉我们的机会-不 我们应该去

translation.en: Picture it. We are at the beach. Industry big shots
translation.zh: 想象一下 我们在海滩边 行业大咖

translation.en: -are listening to your song-- -Yes.
translation.zh: -在听着你的歌…-是呀

translation.en: Yes, easy for you to say 'cause it's not your song.
translation.zh: 你说起来当然容易因为那不是你的歌

translation.en: What if it doesn't go well? Then I'm a joke.
translation.zh: 万一效果不好呢？那我就会变成笑柄

translation.en: But you won't be.
translation.zh: 可你不会的

translation.en: Because you are gonna show them what I've known since I was 12 years old.
translation.zh: 因为你会让他们知道我12岁开始就一直知道的事

translation.en: And that is that you are a star.
translation.zh: 那就是 你是一个明星

translation.en: This is the moment that we moved to Miami for.
translation.zh: 我们来迈阿密就是为了这一刻

translation.en: We're supposed to be there.
translation.zh: 我们注定要去那个派对

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Going to this party?
translation.zh: 去参加那个派对

translation.en: It's our destiny.
translation.zh: 是老天给我们的安排

translation.en: -Yeah! -Now you're talking.
translation.zh: -好！-这话我爱听

translation.en: -Time to work your charm. -I got this.
translation.zh: -该发挥你的魅力了-交给我了

translation.en: You got this. You're a big, strong man.
translation.zh: 你可以的 你是个强健的大块头

translation.en: Listen, you probably get this every night, but it's just like,
translation.zh: 听着 你多半每晚都会听到这话

translation.en: literally just me and my beautiful friends--
translation.zh: 但真的只有我和我美丽帅气的朋友们…

translation.en: Santi? Love your video, man.
translation.zh: 桑蒂？我超喜欢你那个视频 哥们

translation.en: [in English] Come right in.
translation.zh: 直接进去吧 去吧

translation.en: Wait. Stop right there.
translation.zh: 等等 站住

translation.en: We just gotta not be too conspicuous and blend in.
translation.zh: 咱们只需别太引人注意 混入人群

translation.en: Holy fuck. Is that Jon Z?
translation.zh: 老天 那个是乔恩·泽塔？

translation.en: [Ness] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: And is that Brray?
translation.zh: 那个是布瑞？

translation.en: Nah. Everyone is at this party. I gotta go talk to them, Ness.
translation.zh: 所有人都在这派对上我得去跟他们聊聊 内丝

translation.en: What? No, that's the opposite of what I said.
translation.zh: 什么？不行 这有违我刚才的嘱咐

translation.en: -It's my destiny! -No. [sputters]
translation.zh: -这是老天给我的安排！-不

translation.en: I don't think he knows what conspicuous means.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不知道什么叫“引人注意”

translation.en: Santi?
translation.zh: 桑蒂？

translation.en: Mia.
translation.zh: 米娅

translation.en: -How did you-- -What's up? We figured it out.
translation.zh: -你是怎么…-你好吗？我们找到了途径

translation.en: -You did. -You said earlier
translation.zh: -确实如此-你之前说过

translation.en: you're most interested in people who figure things out.
translation.zh: 你最喜欢能找到途径的人

translation.en: So Ness, she figured some stuff out and here we are.
translation.zh: 所以 内丝找到了派对地点我们就来了

translation.en: -Here you are. -[Ness] Here we are.
translation.zh: -你们来了-我们来了

translation.en: What's new with you?
translation.zh: 你有什么新鲜事吗？

translation.en: -Nothing since today. -Good.
translation.zh: -自从今天见面后没啥新鲜事-很好

translation.en: I wanna introduce to you the next big thing in reggaeton.
translation.zh: 我想向大家介绍雷鬼音乐界的下一位巨星

translation.en: My friend, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!
translation.zh: 我的朋友 我的兄弟哈维尔·卢纳！

translation.en: We signed Javier Luna couple of months ago.
translation.zh: 我们几个月前跟哈维尔·卢纳签了约

translation.en: He's great, right?
translation.zh: 他很棒吧？

translation.en: I never heard of him.
translation.zh: 从没听说过他

translation.en: You know, that could be you up there.
translation.zh: 你也可能站在那上面

translation.en: All right, guys, have fun.
translation.zh: 好了 三位 玩得开心

translation.en: I'm gonna go out and mingle.
translation.zh: 我要去应酬了

translation.en: You guys are really here.
translation.zh: 你们真的在这里

translation.en: What kind of look was that?
translation.zh: 刚才那是什么表情？

translation.en: Was that like, "I respect your hustle" look
translation.zh: 是“我很钦佩你们的手段”的表情

translation.en: or was that, "you super overstepped" look?
translation.zh: 还是“你们太过分了”的表情？

translation.en: That was good. That was a good look.
translation.zh: 是积极的 那是积极的表情

translation.en: No, it was bad.
translation.zh: 才不是

translation.en: I'm gonna get a drink.
translation.zh: 我要去弄杯酒喝

translation.en: Yo.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I need to know something.
translation.zh: 我需要知道一件事

translation.en: You started pushing being independent at the meeting,
translation.zh: 你在会面时突然提出要当独立艺人

translation.en: sort of out of nowhere, and honestly, I look around at this party
translation.zh: 很莫名其妙 说实话我看了看派对上的人

translation.en: and it doesn't seem that terrible.
translation.zh: 当签约艺人看上去没那么糟

translation.en: Signing a deal with Mia, if it's a good one,
translation.zh: 如果能跟米娅签一个好合约

translation.en: is the best thing.
translation.zh: 肯定是最佳选择

translation.en: -Right. -And I hope that
translation.zh: -对-我希望

translation.en: she does offer it.
translation.zh: 她真的提出签约

translation.en: And I hope that we didn't actually fuck it up today. I just… [laughs]
translation.zh: 我也希望今天我们没真把事情搞砸 我只是…

translation.en: You clearly vibed with her.
translation.zh: 你显然跟她有共鸣

translation.en: Right? And professionally,
translation.zh: 对吧？从专业度看

translation.en: she is the better version of what I'm supposed to be,
translation.zh: 她的能力绝对是我应该努力的方向

translation.en: and I don't know, I bet everything on this too,
translation.zh: 我也说不好我把一切都押在了这件事上

translation.en: and I just kept seeing this thing in my head of me getting pushed out.
translation.zh: 但我忍不住担心自己会被排除在外

translation.en: Of course, I think she's cool and she knows her shit,
translation.zh: 我当然觉得她很酷 而且很懂行

translation.en: but, like, you're like my fucking sister, bro.
translation.zh: 可你就像是我的亲姐妹一样

translation.en: I'm still at home working for my parents if it's not for you.
translation.zh: 要不是你 我现在还在老家给我爸妈打工呢

translation.en: You see things that I don't,
translation.zh: 你能看见我看不到的东西

translation.en: in people, in situations, in myself.
translation.zh: 你能看透人 看透局势 看透我

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you seeing right now?
translation.zh: 所以 此刻你看到了什么？

translation.en: Dímelo, ¿qué tú quieres hacer? You wanna go?
translation.zh: 你想去吗？

translation.en: What are you feeling?
translation.zh: 你是什么感觉？

translation.en: I guess I'm feeling like, I mean, it is a party,
translation.zh: 我感觉我们在一个派对上

translation.en: and we are in Miami.
translation.zh: 这里是迈阿密

translation.en: And there are a lot of cuties here we can talk to.
translation.zh: 而且这里有很多靓妹我们可以找她们聊天

translation.en: Throw on your Ness swag
translation.zh: 那就拿出你自信的魅力

translation.en: and go bag yourself a cutie, okay?
translation.zh: 去给自己找个靓妹吧？

translation.en: -You want me to wingman you? -No, I do not.
translation.zh: -要我陪你吗？-不需要

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Z y Mr. Brray.
translation.zh: 泽塔先生 布瑞先生

translation.en: I mean, I don't even know what to call you.
translation.zh: 我都不知道该怎么称呼你

translation.en: Papi, just call me Bambi, Bambini,
translation.zh: 小子 可以叫我斑比、斑比尼

translation.en: Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, or Brray, bro.
translation.zh: 斑布里奥、斑维西奥“派对灵魂”或者布莱恩

translation.en: A'ight, I'mma just stick with Brray. [laughs]
translation.zh: 好吧 我还是叫你布瑞吧

translation.en: Yo, listen, I just wanna say that, like,
translation.zh: 听着 我只是想说

translation.en: I'm a huge fan of your work
translation.zh: 我是你们作品的超级粉丝

translation.en: and I think that you guys are just incredible, man.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们很了不起

translation.en: Where do I know you from, bro?
translation.zh: 我在哪里见过你吧 哥们？

translation.en: I'm a reggaeton artist. My name is Santi.
translation.zh: 我是名雷鬼乐艺人 我叫桑蒂

translation.en: Oh, yeah… El video ese de "Exagerao."
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -"Exagerao." -That's a banger, bro.
translation.zh: -《高大上》-那歌很来劲啊 哥们

translation.en: -You got real talent. -Thank you, bro. You, too.
translation.zh: -你很有天赋-谢谢夸奖 哥们 你也是

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [all] It's destiny!
translation.zh: -这是天意！-这是天意！

translation.en: Yo! It's his song! It's his song!
translation.zh: 嘿！这是他的歌！

translation.en: We're getting a record deal, baby!
translation.zh: 我们要签唱片合约了 宝贝！

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: It was a good look, guys.
translation.zh: 两位 昨晚那是积极的表情

translation.en: Oscar Morales's office.
translation.zh: 这里是奥斯卡·莫拉莱斯的办公室

translation.en: No, this is his assistant, Mia.
translation.zh: 不 我是他的助理米娅

translation.en: Okay, I'll pass that message along. Okay, bye.
translation.zh: 好的 我会告诉他的 好 再见

translation.en: [Oscar] Mia, my coffee, please! And where's my dry-cleaning?
translation.zh: 米娅 请把我的咖啡拿来！我干洗的衣服呢？

translation.en: It just got here.
translation.zh: 刚刚送来
